definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Because water becomes bitterness, slay many human.
sentences.chinese: 因水變苦，就死了許多人。

sentences.english: Just graduated out to work, there will always be some bitter suffering.
sentences.chinese: 剛畢業出來工作，總是會有一些裏面變苦了。

sentences.english: A third of the drinking waters turned bitter and many people died from the bitter water.
sentences.chinese: 衆水的三分之一變苦，很多人因而死亡。
